Posts.Content: Oct 23, 2012 09:41AM - edited Oct 23, 2012 09:42AM by Limabean I had a single mastectomy with no reconstruction. I plan on making my own garments that do not hide this decision. I have been looking online to see if anyone is doing this and found nothing so far. Have you made any attempts to make your own clothes? I am still recovering from surgery so I'm not in a position to get out my sewing machine just yet, but I'm encouraged that I'm not the only one interested!
Posts.Title: Make your own Mastectomy clothing? greenfrog River_Rat
